title: Is there a way to calibrate the screen so it picks up on where I'm touching brtter?
content: I want to be able to calibrate my phone so it picks up on the way I touch it more easily. I know I had a phone in the past that allowed me to do this bug not sure if it was my pixel. It's frustrating it doesn't always touch right.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
